data.title: Hollywood star Sharon Stone gasps, screams ‘oh my God’ after seeing Shah Rukh Khan next to her
data.description: Sharon Stone screamed and Shah Rukh watched her response and leaned in to say hello. They were seen on camera exchanging "Namaste" as well.

data.title: Avatar: The Way of Water box office collection Day 1: James Cameron's magnum opus earns Rs 41 crore in India
data.description: The film is the second biggest Hollywood opener in India. Avatar: The Way of Water has surpassed Spider-Man, Avengers Infinity War and Doctor Stanger to become the second-highest Hollywood opener in India.

data.author: AFP
data.title: Who is Viktor Bout, the Russian arms smuggler, involved in the prisoner swap?
data.description: Bout’s notoriety inspired Hollywood film “Lord of War”, starring Nicolas Cage, in which the anti-hero escaped justice

data.title: Battery drained; link lost: India’s Mars orbiter craft Mangalyaan completes its long innings
data.description: The Mangalyaan mission, mounted at a budget lower than the Hollywood movie Gravity, exceeded its operational expectations as the spacecraft was inserted into Martian orbit on September 24, 2014 in the first attempt.

data.title: ‘Avatar 2’ rakes in Rs 20 cr in advance booking in India, expected to earn between Rs 40- Rs 50 cr on Friday: Report
data.description: The James Cameron-directed movie is anticipated to earn between Rs 40 crore and Rs 50 crore at the Indian box office on Friday, a respectable start for any big-budgeted Hollywood production
data.source: Business Today | Latest Stock Market And Economy News India

data.author: Reuters
data.title: 'Fabelmans,' 'Banshees' win top awards as Hollywood re-embraces Golden Globes
data.description: The two biggest box office successes of 2022 - “Avatar: The Way of Water” and “Top Gun: Maverick” - were shut out.

data.title: PVR reports Rs 71 cr loss in Q2 as Bollywood’s underperformance continues to hit margins
data.description: India’s largest multiplex operator PVR Cinemas suffered the underperformance of Bollywood and Hollywood releases in the September quarter, even though it clocked its “busiest day of 2022” during the period.
data.source: Business Today | Latest Stock Market And Economy News India
